text: Giulio Fiou (17 May 1938 – 17 August 2024) was an Italian politician. He was the mayor of Aosta from 1992 to 1995. He was a member of the Democratic Party of the Left. He was born in Aosta, Italy. Fiou was also elected to the Regional Council of Aosta Valley in the XII and XI legislatures. He died on 17 August 2024, at the age of 86.Lutto: è morto Giulio Fiou, ex sindaco di Aosta e consigliere regionale == References == Category:1938 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Italian mayors Category:People from Aosta Valley
title: Giulio Fiou
